Mnguni
column2: the founder of the Nguni nation in southern Africa

column1:
Ntombhela kaMalandela, son of Malandela.
Mageba kaPhunga (d. 1745)
column3: chief of the Zulu clan from 1727 to 1745.

column1:
Jama kaNdaba (d. 1781), son of Ndaba, chief of the Zulu clan from 1763 to 1781.
Senzangakhona kaJama (ca. 1762-1816)
column3: chief of the Zulu clan from 1781 to 1816.

column1:
Shaka kaSenzangakhona (ca. 1787-1828), son of Senzangakona, king from 1816 to 1828.
Dingane kaSenzangakhona (ca. 1795-1840)
column2: son of Senzangakona and half-brother of Shaka

column1:
Mpande kaSenzangakhona (1798-1872), son of Senzangakona and half-brother of Shaka and Dingane, king from 1840 to 1872.
Cetshwayo kaMpande (1826-February 1884)

Dinuzulu kaCetshwayo (1868-1913), son of Cetshwayo kaMpande, king from 1884 to 1913.
Solomon kaDinuzulu (1891-1933)

Cyprian Bhekuzulu kaSolomon (4 August 1924-17 September 1968), son of Solomon kaDinuzulu, king from 1948 to 1968.
Goodwill Zwelethini kaBhekuzulu (b. 14 July 1948)
